author: gtully
msg: resolve https://issues.apache.org/activemq/browse/AMQ-2670 - apply patch with thanks. Now possible to integrate RAR XAResource with jboss via the jboss org.jboss.jms.server.recovery.MessagingXAResourceRecovery handler

author: woonsan
msg: JS2-1152: Not to display some system portlets in toolbox: space navigator portlet, custom config mode portlet and custom preview mode portlet.
The space navigator is designed to include once; not allowed for end users to add to a page.
Meanwhile, custom preview mode portlet and custom config mode portlet are designed to invoke internally by the portal only.

author: slaws
msg: Mainly note to self. Start to clarify WS binding methods.

author: slaws
msg: Support bindings that specify WSDL or specify uris and expect WSDL to be generated. This is still based on default JAXWS impl
